document.full_text: chris miller's cd-only music store in oak park carries about 40,000 discs and, according to mr. miller, 'strictly has whatever unusual things people who live around here might want.'
document.title: chicago news cooperative: a cd-only music store that plays to its own beat
lines_and_colors: chris miller's cd-only music store in oak park carries about 40,000 discs and, according to mr. miller, 'strictly has whatever unusual things people who live around here might want.'
